title: MARIA ANGELA HOLGUIN (COLOMBIA) | Secretary-General | United Nations

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: Ms. Holguin is the current Foreign Minister of Colombia. Her career spans two decades of activity in the private and public sectors, including senior positions in the Office of the President of the Republic, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Office of the Inspector General of the Nation. She previously served as Permanent Representative of Colombia to the United Nations.
